excerpt: "Japanese electronics giant NEC will purchase Swiss banking software developer Avaloq for 2.05 billion Swiss francs ($2.2 billion), the company said on Monday. NEC plans to acquire all 52,488 shares of Avaloq's parent company by April 2021,"
